creator: jonathan.addison@wyona.com
text:
A doctype can be added to webdav html documents to enable structured editing for
clients that support it.

Created attachment 17926
xhtml module sitemap.xmap patch

Adds xml and doctype declarations to the xml-get serializer in the xhtml module
sitemap.

Documents open as xhtml in Dreamweaver, Frontpage, and other clients that
recognize the doctype.	Documents open as xml in Word 2003.
creator: jonathan.addison@wyona.com
